message.body: Good luck today. If you get a chance, let me know how it goes.
If I may ask, how'd it go today?
I just posted on Facebook about it... Hoping tomorrow will be better ;-)
###### and I watched the damn choppy streams all day looking for you. The resolution was so damn low we were counting lanes trying to spot you.
Ha ha ha. I know, their tech is awful. Tomorrow I'll be on lane ## in a ###### shirt, but not until 5pm eastern time. Today I was in navy blue.
The shoe thing is sadly hilarious. One day a famous cyclist rode a race in the rain. The lady at the cottage he stayed in that night put his shoes in the oven t
o dry, and destroyed them, and the story goes that they made him new shoes to continue the race.
Newspaper for drying stuffing, no ovens, in case that was an option.
Oh man. Well, I sympathize with him. I guess I should be happy I didn't hurt myself to badly to play. My knees are bruised
Hope you keep enjoying it, keep us up to date, and mention ##### llc can handle their future streaming needs.
Whew, your knees. Watching the streams made my knees hurt from 2000 miles away.
I'm actually going to talk to them about it, because the setup is terrible. I was looking around today and I'm 90% sure the feeds are from the ################# security cameras :-P
